error.forbidden: The server understood the request but refuses to authorize it.
error.invalid_ics_file: There was a problem reading the calendar information. See the error log for additional details.
error.unauthorized: Authentication failed. Please verify your API key or credentials are correct.

data_description.password: Password for HTTP Basic Authentication (required by your reverse proxy or server).
data_description.username: Username for HTTP Basic Authentication (required by your reverse proxy or server).

auth.description: Authentication is required to access this calendar. Please provide your credentials.

data_description.calendar_name: The name of the calendar shown in the UI.
data_description.url: The URL of the remote calendar.

user.description: Please choose a name for the calendar to be imported

timeout.message: The connection timed out. See the debug log for additional details.

unable_to_fetch.message: Unable to fetch calendar data. See the debug log for additional details.
